DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine single intra-articular injection Gel-200 superior single injection Phosphate Buffered Saline ( PBS ) subject symptomatic osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnosis painful , symptomatic tibiofemoral osteoarthritis knee ( Grade 13 Kellgren Lawrence ( KL ) score ) . Subjects Grade 4 KL score Subjects inflammatory disease knee osteoarthritis rheumatoid arthritis Serious systemic disease Female subject pregnant lactating
